mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Looks forward to Short's visit this summer; extols the virtues of riding; the final professors are being procured for the University of Virginia, and the school will open February 7, 1825; "we shall be second to nothing in the U.S. in the field of science, medicine excepted."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1824 April 10, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William Short], n.p.
